Package HMS.Systems

Class AppointmentOutcomeSystem

java.lang.Object
HMS.Systems.AppointmentOutcomeSystem
public class AppointmentOutcomeSystem extends Object
Manages the appointment outcome records within the hospital management system. This class is responsible for loading, storing, and accessing appointment outcome HMS.data.

  • Method Details

    • getOutcomes

      public static List<AppointmentOutcomeRecord> getOutcomes()
      Retrieves all appointment outcomes that are not yet dispensed.
      Returns:
      a list of AppointmentOutcomeRecord objects that have not been dispensed.

    • addOutcome

      public static void addOutcome(AppointmentOutcomeRecord outcome)
      Adds a new appointment outcome to the list and saves it to the file.
      Parameters:
      outcome - the AppointmentOutcomeRecord to add.

    • getOutcomeByAppointmentID

      public static AppointmentOutcomeRecord getOutcomeByAppointmentID(int appointmentID)
      Retrieves an outcome by appointment ID.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - the ID of the appointment.
      Returns:
      the corresponding outcome, or null if not found.

    • displayOutcomesForDoctor

      public static void displayOutcomesForDoctor(String doctorID)
      Displays all outcomes for a doctor by doctor ID.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - the doctor's ID.

    • displayOutcomesForPatient

      public static void displayOutcomesForPatient(String patientID)
      Displays all outcomes for a patient by patient ID.
      Parameters:
      patientID - the patient's ID.

    • displayAllOutcomes

      public static void displayAllOutcomes()
      Displays all appointment outcomes.

    • isValidOutcomeSelection

      public static boolean isValidOutcomeSelection(String input)
      Validates if the user input corresponds to a valid outcome ID.
      Parameters:
      input - the user input.
      Returns:
      true if the input is a valid outcome ID, false otherwise.

    • addOutcomeByDoctor

      public static void addOutcomeByDoctor(String doctorID)
      Allows a doctor to add outcomes for their approved appointments.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - the doctor's ID.

    • displayAllAppointmentOutcomes

      public static void displayAllAppointmentOutcomes()
      Displays all undispensed appointment outcomes in a tabular format.

    • dispenseMedication

      public static void dispenseMedication(int outcomeID)
      Dispenses medication for a specified appointment outcome. This method checks if stock is available and deducts the stock level accordingly. If stock is low, it creates a replenish request.
      Parameters:
      outcomeID - The ID of the appointment outcome for which medication will be dispensed.
